title: Website Engineer
description: Designing and developing responsive, data-driven, and user-centered websites. Experienced in building scalable systems using frameworks like React.js, Laravel and integrating efficient backend architectures. Focused on creating digital solutions that balance performance, usability, and aesthetics.

title: Mobile Engineer
description: Building intuitive and high-performing mobile applications with frameworks such as React Native. Skilled in translating complex workflows into seamless mobile experiences while maintaining reliability and speed. Prioritizing accessibility and design consistency across platforms.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Developing intelligent systems that leverage machine learning and graph-based data structures to uncover patterns and generate recommendations. Experienced in data preprocessing, model optimization, and deploying ML-powered applications. Bridging research innovation with practical implementations.
